Package com.ltts

Class ExtentReporterNG

java.lang.Object
com.ltts.ExtentReporterNG
Direct Known Subclasses:
DriverGenerator
public class ExtentReporterNG
extends Object
ExtentReporterNG has all methods related to the extent reports.
